thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
It just doesn't get any easier
Told the gentleman what I needed
He gave me a few options. I opted for a taller tire than what I had . He mounted the taller tire and put it on my van to check clearance . I had to drop down a size, but that was great that he tried the larger tire
Van drives like another vehicle
Very happy with TFR
